name: Vaseline Aloe Fresh Body Lotion
description: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Fresh Body Lotion is enriched with 100% pure aloe vera extracts and microdroplets of Vaseline jelly, restores skin's moisture and helps maintain hydration in skin.  Aloe vera is an effective skin-conditioning which calms the skin and leaves it feeling deeply moisturized.  Vaseline Jelly creates an extra layer of protection, preventing moisture from escaping and helping aid your skin's natural recovery process *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
